title: Alzheimer 's in the U.S : lifetime risks , by age and gender
summary: In , around 10.3 % of inhabitants in U.S Men agreed with defining themselves as 45_years , while only 19.5 % considered themselves afro-descendants .
In addition , 11.6 % thought of themselves as Women 45_years , and 21.1 % as Women 65_years .
Relations between U.S and the country As neighboring North American countries , U.S 's relationship with the country has been a priority in both countries ' foreign policies .
gold: This statistic depicts the estimated lifetime risk for getting Alzheimer 's disease in the United States as of 2015 , by age and gender.
It is estimated that men aged 65 have a 11.6 percent risk of developing Alzheimer 's during their life .
